ends_at_midday.description: Whether the Leave ends at midday

user.external_id.description: Unique reference of the User (see [External Ids](#tag/External-Ids)). Either `user.napta_id` or `user.external_id` must be provided (but not both).
user.external_id.title: User.External Id
